title: Grapefruit: A Book of Instructions and Drawings
description: Back in print for the first time in nearly thirty years, here is Yoko Ono's whimsical, delightful, subversive, startling book of instructions for art and for life."A dream you dream alone may be a dream, but a dream two people dream together is a reality.""Burn this book after you've read it."  -- Yoko Ono"This is the greatest book I've ever burned."  -- John Lennon
author: Yoko Ono
